sentences.en: 34 An idle youth, a needy age.
A young man idle , an old man needy.
sentences.cn: 少时闲混, 老来穷困.

sentences.en: Although he was poor, he was quite generous to his needy friends.
sentences.cn: 他虽穷, 但对贫苦的朋友很慷慨.

sentences.en: He afforded a temporary shelter for the needy.
sentences.cn: 他为穷人提供暂时的安身之处.

sentences.en: He deemed that it was his duty to help the needy.
sentences.cn: 他认为帮助穷人是他的责任.

sentences.en: He gave away a part of his income to his needy friends.
sentences.cn: 他把收入的一部分送给经济困难的朋友们.

sentences.en: He is a shabby, needy man.
sentences.cn: 他是个衣衫褴褛的穷人.

sentences.en: It behooves us to help the needy.
Maybe I should play this needy, despondent waif card more often.
sentences.cn: 也许我应该用用这个迷惑, 多需求的招牌.

sentences.en: My uncle carpentered a table and a few stools for his needy neighbor.
sentences.cn: 我叔父给他穷困的邻居做了一张桌子和几只凳子.

sentences.en: The previously free ( = not paid for ) distribution of text books will now be confined to students who are needy.
sentences.cn: 以前免费发放课本,现在只给贫困学生.

sentences.en: There will be efforts to get larger amounts of food to the needy.
sentences.cn: 将努力为贫困者筹措更多的食品。

sentences.en: They awarded scholarships to needy students.
sentences.cn: 他们给贫苦学生颁发奖学金.

sentences.en: They collected money to help needy children.
sentences.cn: 他们集资帮助贫穷的孩子.

sentences.en: This is 24 hexadecimal counter source, needy students can refer to you!
sentences.cn: 这是二十四进制计数器的源程序, 有需要的同学可以参照一下!

words.tran_cn: 贫困的；贫穷的；生活艰苦的

trans.tran_en: having very little food or money
The needy are people who are needy
